clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability and Effect of Nexagon™ Applied to the Eye After PRK Laser Eye Surgery for Nearsightedness
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Randomized, Prospective, Double-Masked, Vehicle-Controlled, Dose-Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Clinical Effect of Nexagon™ in Subjects Following Bilateral Photorefractive Keratectomy (PRK) for the Correction of Mild to Moderate Myopia.

brief_summary.textblock: Phase 1 randomized, prospective, double-masked, vehicle-controlled, dose-escalation study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and clinical effect of Nexagon™ in subjects following bilateral PRK for the correction of mild to moderate myopia.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the clinical effect of Nexagon™

intervention.description: Dose-escalation design in which cohorts of 6 subjects will be studied sequentially.
